title: Should David Coulthard have been Williams’ world champion?
summary: Thirty years ago, in September 1995, David Coulthard scored the first of his eventual 13 grand prix wins at only his 21st attempt, and what turned out to be his…

qa_pairs.question: How many grand prix wins did David Coulthard achieve in his Formula 1 career?

What year did David Coulthard score his first win in Formula 1?
